context.p: At board level, you can use card filtering to display cards with specific labels, members, due dates and keywords. Filtering even works if you are not a member.

choices.choice: Type the words you are searching for, separated by commas, in the search field.

step.stepresult: The board will show only the cards that correspond to the search criteria. The board menu displays the active filtering link ().

step.cmd: To change the filters, click and click the criteria again, to activate/ deactivate them.
